		A_I <= "11000001 10010000 00000000 00000000"; -- -18 : 0xC190000
		B_I <= "01000001 00011000 00000000 00000000"; -- 9.5 : 0x41180000
		C_I <= "11000011 00101011 00000000 00000000"; -- -171 : 0xC32B0000

      
		A_I <= "01000001 01011000 00000000 00000000"; -- 13.5 : 0x41580000
		B_I <= "11000001 10010000 00000000 00000000"; -- -18 : 0xc1900000
		C_I <= "11000011 01110011 00000000 00000000"; -- -243 : 0xc3730000

		
		A_I <= "01000001 01011000 00000000 00000000"; -- 13.5 : 0x41580000
		B_I <= "11000001 11010000 00000000 00000000"; -- -26 : 0xc1d00000
		C_I <= "11000011 10101111 10000000 00000000"; -- -351 : 0xc3af8000

		
		A_I <= "01000001 01011000 00000000 00000000"; -- 13.5 : 0x41580000
		B_I <= "11111111 10000000 00000000 00000000"; -- -inf : 0xff800000
		C_I <= "11111111 10000000 00000000 00000000" -- -inf : 0xff800000

		
		A_I <= "01000001 01011000 00000000 00000000"; -- 13.5 : 0x41580000
		B_I <= "01111111 10000000 00000000 00000000"; -- +inf : 0x7f800000
		C_I <= "01111111 10000000 00000000 00000000"; -- +inf : 0x7f800000

		A_I <= "01000001 01011000 00000000 00000000"; -- 13.5 : 0x41580000
		B_I <= "11111111 11000000 00000000 00000001"; -- NaN : 0xffc00001
		C_I <= "01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111";-- NaN : 0x7fffffff
